name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior JavaScript Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and API development, with a strong focus on **REST** and **SOAP** services. Expert in database management with hands-on experience in **SQL**, **SQLite**, and **PostgreSQL**. Skilled in creating robust serverless applications using **AWS Lambda**, **API Gateway**, and **Serverless Framework**. Demonstrated ability in **Automated Testing** and delivering exceptional **API Design** and documentation. Strong leadership skills with a deep commitment to **customer-oriented** solutions.

In addition to technical skills, my background encompasses proficiency in modern frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, ensuring scalability and maintainability of the applications developed. Experienced in deploying applications on both **Azure** and **AWS**, with knowledge of microservices architecture and CI/CD automation.

I bring practical experience in leading development teams while solving complex problems and fostering effective communication. My passion lies in building systems that are technically sound and deliver measurable impact.
